name: logback4js
description: Logger for JavaScript inspired by Logback.

scripts.build:core: rimraf dist/core && tsc -p src/core/tsconfig.core.json && cpx src/core/package.json dist/core && cpx src/core/README.md dist/core
scripts.build:discord: rimraf dist/appenders/discord && tsc -p src/appenders/discord/tsconfig.discord.json && cpx src/appenders/discord/package.json dist/appenders/discord
scripts.build:line: rimraf dist/appenders/line && tsc -p src/appenders/line/tsconfig.line.json && cpx src/appenders/line/package.json dist/appenders/line
scripts.build:microsoft: rimraf dist/appenders/microsoft && tsc -p src/appenders/microsoft/tsconfig.microsoft.json && cpx src/appenders/microsoft/package.json dist/appenders/microsoft
scripts.build:slack: rimraf dist/appenders/slack && tsc -p src/appenders/slack/tsconfig.slack.json && cpx src/appenders/slack/package.json dist/appenders/slack
scripts.build:twitter: rimraf dist/appenders/twitter && tsc -p src/appenders/twitter/tsconfig.twitter.json && cpx src/appenders/twitter/package.json dist/appenders/twitter
scripts.publish:core: npm run build:core && cd dist/core && npm publish
scripts.publish:appenders:discord: npm run build:discord && cd dist/appenders/discord && npm publish
scripts.publish:appenders:google-analytics: npm run build:google-analytics && cd dist/appenders/google-analytics && npm publish
scripts.publish:appenders:line: npm run build:line && cd dist/appenders/line && npm publish
scripts.publish:appenders:microsoft: npm run build:microsoft && cd dist/appenders/microsoft && npm publish
scripts.publish:appenders:slack: npm run build:slack && cd dist/appenders/slack && npm publish
scripts.publish:appenders:twitter: npm run build:twitter && cd dist/appenders/twitter && npm publish

author: kumo01
